test_questions.question:
What is the purpose of the following Maven dependency?

<dependency>
  <groupId>log4j</groupId>
  <artifactId>log4j</artifactId>
  <version>1.2.17</version>
</dependency>
What is the default embedded container used by Spring Boot for web applications?
In Spring Boot, what is the purpose of the @GetMapping annotation?

options.B: To map HTTP GET requests to a controller method

test_questions.question: What is the primary purpose of the MainActivity class in an Android application?

To which group do the following annotations correspond?
@Transactional, @NoRepositoryBean, @Param, @ID, @Transient, @CreatedBy

To which group do the following annotations correspond?
@Query, @Procedure, @Lock, @Modifying, @EnableJpaRepositories
Which method is responsible for inflating the layout of a fragment in Android?
What is the purpose of the @RestController annotation in a Spring Boot application?

options.B: To handle HTTP requests and produce RESTful responses
